Class ec.transform.guestloader.ConstCheck 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.guestloader.ConstCheck
public class ConstCheck
extends Object
implements ClassFilter
The ConstCheck class checks classes to ensure they obey the VAT rules about static class fields being, in fact, const. It defers checking referenced classes to ensure they implement the "ec.meta.Const" interface until they are loaded.

ConstCheck()
ConstCheck(boolean)

transformClass(ClassFile)
Transform the given ClassFile as needed to allow it to be admitted into the system.

ConstCheck 
 public ConstCheck(boolean amLogging)
ConstCheck 
 public ConstCheck()

transformClass 
 public ClassFile transformClass(ClassFile cf) throws DoNotAdmitException
Transform the given ClassFile as needed to allow it to be admitted into the system. This method performs destructive modifications to its argument. It returns its argument. It throws a DoNotAdmitException if the class does not conform to the requirements for entry to the VAT.

Parameters:
cf - the ClassFile to transform
Returns:
the modified ClassFile.
Throws: DoNotAdmitException
thrown if the class should not be allowed in to the VAT.
